name: shyrky-o
description:
Shyrky-o

I don't know how to spell that.

Game done for the Brackeys GameJam. The theme: Rewind. In the game there are these rewind boxes that you can collide with to rebuild the last broken quadrant.

It was my first time ever doing pixel art, therefore I decided on a 8-bit 4-color palette to make it simple. It is not exactly incredible.

I made a devlog video:

Controls
  • WASD (or arrow keys) to move.
  • Click to teleport to a quadrant. It maintains the relative position (and physic process) with respect to the previous quadrant.
  • Press space bar (or enter) to restart.
